catu#ShkapAlA Bavantiq catu#ShpAqddhyaSvaqH samRu#ddhyAq Ekaqmati#riktaqM nirva#pEqd-yamEqva pra#tigrAqhI Bava#tiq yaM ~MvAq nAddhyEtiq tasmA#dEqva va#ruNapAqSAn mu#cyatEq yadyapa#raM pratigrAqhI syAth sauqryamEka#kapAlaqmanuq 
nirva#pEdaqmumEqvA &&diqtyamu#ccAqraM ku#rutEq &pO#&vaBRuqthamavai$tyaqPsu vai varu#NaH sAqkShAdEqva varu#Naqmava# yajatE &pOnaqptrIya#M caqruM ( ) punaqrEtyaq nirva#pEdaqPsu yO#niqrvA aSvaqH svAmEqvainaqM~MyOni#M gamayatiq sa 
E#na(gm) SAqnta upa# tiShThatE || 47 
(muq~jcaqtiq - caqru(gm) - saqptada#Sa ca) (A12)
